metadata.name: Dad's Toolbox
metadata.description:
[h1] ABOUT [/h1] [list] [*]The [b]ULTIMATE RNG [/b] item introduced into Isaac. Dad's Toolbox has a chance to drop PICKUPS and ITEMS when the player gets hit.
[*]The chances for good pickups and items are generally balanced. Not all items nor pickups exist in Dad's Toolbox. If you wish to test your luck there are INCREDIBLY low chances for certain effects to happen upon taking damage including QUALITY 4 ITEMS to spawn.
[*]Dad's Toolbox spawns in shops for a price of 30, treasure rooms and secret rooms. Dad's Toolbox is a quality 3 item. However if you are insanely lucky this item pays back for itself tenfold. The happy animation plays if you got a lucky drop from the toolbox. The item has potential to be "broken" if you, the player, finds themselves with a good source of hearts or some form of invincibility.
[*]EID description compatible.
[*][b]GOOD LUCK![/b] [/list]
